org.efaps.update.schema.program

Class AbstractSourceImporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.efaps.update.schema.program.AbstractSourceImporter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractStaticSourceImporter, BPMImporter, ESJPImporter, JasperReportImporter

    public abstract class AbstractSourceImporter
extends Object
    Class used to import programs into eFaps.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    The eFaps Team

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static String ENCODING
      Defines the encoding of source code within eFaps.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractSourceImporter(CIType _type, URL _url)
      Constructor used to read the source code from given URL and extract the class name.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractSourceImporter

        public AbstractSourceImporter(CIType _type,
                      URL _url)
                       throws InstallationException
        Constructor used to read the source code from given URL and extract the class name.
        Parameters:
        _type - related eFaps type
        _url - URL to the source code
        Throws:
        InstallationException - on error
        See Also:
        readCode(), evalProgramName(), evalUUID(), evalRevision()

    • Method Detail

      • readCode

        protected void readCode()
                 throws InstallationException
        Read the code from the file defined through url with character set ENCODING.
        Throws:
        InstallationException - if the source code could not read from URL
        See Also:
        url, ENCODING

      • evalProgramName

        protected abstract String evalProgramName()
                                   throws InstallationException
        This Method extracts the Name from the program.
        Returns:
        Name of the program
        Throws:
        InstallationException - on error

        Throws:
        InstallationException - on error

        protected abstract String evalRevision()
                                throws InstallationException
        This Method extracts the Revision from the program.
        Returns:
        Revision of the program
        Throws:
        InstallationException - on error

      • execute

        public void execute()
             throws InstallationException
        Import related source code into the eFaps DataBase. If the source code does not exists, the source code is created in eFaps.
        Throws:
        InstallationException - on error
        See Also:
        searchInstance(), createInstance(), updateDB(Instance)

      • searchInstance

        public Instance searchInstance()
                        throws InstallationException
        Method to search the Instance which is imported.
        Returns:
        Instance of the imported program
        Throws:
        InstallationException - if search failed

      • createInstance

        protected Instance createInstance()
                           throws InstallationException
        Creates an instance of a source object in eFaps for given name.
        Returns:
        new created instance
        Throws:
        InstallationException - on error
        See Also:
        programName

      • updateDB

        public void updateDB(Instance _instance)
              throws InstallationException
        Stores the read source code in eFaps. This is done with a check in.
        Parameters:
        _instance - instance (object id) of the source code object in eFaps
        Throws:
        InstallationException - if source code in eFaps could not updated or the source code could not encoded

      • newCodeInputStream

        protected InputStream newCodeInputStream()
                                  throws UnsupportedEncodingException
        Creates a new byte array input stream for code which is encoded in character set ENCODING.
        Returns:
        byte array input stream
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException - if code could not be encoded
        See Also:
        code
